alert.note: Alert for Gregg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 26 at 4:37PM CDT until April 26 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN SMITH...NORTHWESTERN RUSK AND SOUTHWESTERN GREGG COUNTIES... At 436 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Overton to Troup, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Henderson, Kilgore, Overton, Troup, New London, Arp, Turnertown, Joinerville, Rolling Meadows and Laird Hill. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
